text: Ārau araśyē āmi muchāka āmāra nidarśanasaha praēraṇa karaichilō ārau kaichilō, ‘tōmāra sampradāẏaka andhakārara paraā pōharalai lai āhā, ārau siham̐taka āllāhara dinabōrara (arthāṯ bibhinna sampradāẏara śāstira dinabōrara) dbāraā upadēśa diẏā’. Iẏāta nidarśana āchē pratyēka parama dhairyaśīla ārau parama kr̥tajña byaktira bābē
